entries.journal_entry_description: Combat review in Star Wars Galaxies
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Combat is a major part of the Star Wars Galaxy experience. You begin by equipping a weapon. To do this, open your inventory (press  I). In your inventory you will find a number of different starting weapons. Locate the weapon you wish to equip. Right click on it to bring up the radial menu.  From the radial menu, select Equip. This will put the weapon into your hand, ready to use. You will notice in your inventory that the equipped weapon will have a green shading to it, which tells you that it is equipped.

entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Place cursor on the destroyed droideka. Single left click to target it. Notice its health bar now shows up on your screen. As you attack the droideka, this bar will slide down in size to show the damage you are doing.  Notice your own health, action, and mind bars. As enemies attack you, you will notice your own health diminishing. You will use your Action and Mind bars by performing the more complicated combat abilities you will gain as you advance in the game.

entries.task02_journal_entry_description: To engage your enemy, you will click on buttons in your activities bar. If you are using a ranged button, such as a rifle, pistol or carbine, single left click on ranged attack button. If you are using a melee weapon, such as a sword or staff, single left click on ?melee attack? button. Each time you click on the button, you make one attack. You can attack again once the timer for that ability is completed its cycle. If you would like to automatically repeat the attack at the end of its cycle, press CNTRL while you click on the attack button. You will notice a check mark appears on the attack button on your tool bar. To remove the repeating attack, press CNTRL and click on the checked button again.
